setting.geography: A fog-bound port city on the Pacific coast, 1947
setting.society: Post-war boom masking deep corruption; dockworkers, ex-soldiers, old money
setting.technology: Rotary phones, film cameras, early wiretaps
setting.atmosphere: Perpetual low fog. Rain three days out of five. Neon reflects off wet streets.

characters.name: Maren Cole
goals: find who killed dockworker Jimmy Tsao
fears: becoming as corrupt as the people she investigates
beliefs: everyone lies, but the lies tell you something
characters.voice_notes: Dry, understated. Short sentences. Internal monologue is more poetic than her speech.

characters.name: Dutch Harmon
traits: owed favors by half the city
goals: protect his bar from the Halloran family
fears: what he did during the war coming out
beliefs: a man's word used to mean something
characters.voice_notes: Booming laugh. Speaks in stories. Deflects hard questions with jokes.

characters.name: Iris Halloran
traits: unexpectedly kind to those who can't hurt her
goals: expand Halloran shipping into legitimate business
beliefs: power is the only honest currency
characters.voice_notes: Carefully modulated voice. Uses silence as a weapon. Never apologizes.
